proposal: Understanding the essence of human verification in today's digital landscape is crucial, and it seems you're on a mission to make it seamless. With 16 holders in the ETH network, you're clearly making strides. Imagine integrating a DEX or a community-driven lottery into your ecosystem, enhancing engagement and offering revenue-sharing opportunities. Let's explore how our B2B tools can align with your vision, making the digital world a bit more human, one transaction at a time.
